H0.text: Lungs are the organ system that brings oxygen into the body and releases carbon dioxide.

H1.text: Liver is the organ system that brings oxygen into the body and releases carbon dioxide.

H2.text: Brain is the organ system that brings oxygen into the body and releases carbon dioxide.

H3.text: Kidneys are the organ system that brings oxygen into the body and releases carbon dioxide.

A4.text: The primary purpose of the respiratory system is the equalizing of the partial pressures of the respiratory gases in the alveolar air with those in the pulmonary capillary blood

A5.text: Ventilation of the lungs in mammals occurs via the respiratory centers in the medulla oblongata
